title: BRIEF-QMS Media Says Entered Into Scheme Implementation Deed With Quadrant Private Equity
text:
BRIEF-QMS Media Says Entered Into Scheme Implementation Deed With Quadrant Private Equity

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 10:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-QMS Media Says Entered Into Scheme Implementation Deed With Quadrant Private Equity Oct 29 (Reuters) - QMS Media Ltd : * QUADRANT PRIVATE EQUITY TO ACQUIRE QMS MEDIA LIMITED * DEAL FOR A$1.22 PER SHARE * SCHEME CONSIDERATION VALUES QMS MEDIA'S EQUITY AT ABOUT $420.6 MILLION * UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMEND QUADRANT SCHEME IN ABSENCE OF A SUPERIOR PROPOSAL * SCHEME CONSIDERATION VALUES QMS MEDIA ENTERPRISE VALUE OF $571.6 MILLION * QMS SHAREHOLDERS WILL ALSO BE ENTITLED TO A FINAL DIVIDEND OF UP TO 1.3 CENTS FOR FINANCIAL YEAR ENDING 31 DECEMBER 2019 * ENTERED INTO A SCHEME IMPLEMENTATION DEED WITH QUADRANT

BRIEF-QMS Media Says Entered Into Scheme Implementation Deed With Quadrant Private Equity
description: BRIEF-QMS Media Says Entered Into Scheme Implementation Deed With Quadrant Private Equity
